name: Kill Yasuhiro
description:
This is my game for Ludum Dare 48! It's a sword game where you are tasked with going deep into enemy lines to kill a general and change the course of a battle.

This is my first time doing ludum dare, but my fourth jam overall. I have really enjoyed making this!

Here are some screenshots:

I hope you like this game as much as I have liked making it!
